Detailed Description

DiagramInterconnection represents graphically an IP-XACT port.

void DiagramPort::setTemporary ( bool  temp  ) 

Sets the port temporary or not temporary. Temporary port set its bus interface undefined automatically if the connections are removed.

Parameters:
[in] temp True if temporary; false if not temporary.
